name: GODLEFTUS
description:
Retro shooter in the space based on fast movement.

Your goal is to find all the pieces of portal, placed around whole level to move to the next level. But it won't be easy at all! You will oftenly meet dangerous enemies and hard platforming-sections on your way to another piece of portal, just to reach the next, harder level. 

Currently, there are five levels:

Tutorial, First one, Second one, Third one and Bossfight one. 

New ones will be added in future.
